column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////Spent the week in Chicago with a group of 19 and this was our last breakfast before heading home!  This place is FANTASTIC!  They had a line and quite a wait when we arrive and with 19 I expected a LONG wait -- that was not the case at all.  They move quickly to seat and we all ate together outside in beautiful weather with a back drop of Millennium Park and the skyline.  It was beautiful!  As if that wasn't enough
column2: the food was OUT OF THIS WORLD!  The helpings were huge and the food was delicious.  The service was top notch!  When you take a large group anywhere you expect delayed service and less than happy servers.  This was the complete opposite and we appreciate being treated so well!  Thanks Renzo and his happy helper!  A must eat location in Chicago!
